archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Categorize Resource Trouble
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process is responsible for categorizing the resource trouble according to the type of the trouble, impact, and standardized criteria at Resource-Ops level. Moreover, this activity will be carried out with appropriate diligence, in order to provide inputs to the "Track & Manage Resource Trouble" process.

properties.value: This process is responsible for categorizing the resource trouble according to the type of the trouble, impact, and standardized criteria at Resource-Ops level.
